name: universal-auth-a2a-mcp-aws
description: Universal auth A2A and MCP for AWS

scripts.foundation:up: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file agentic-foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-foundation-staging --parameter-overrides Environment=staging KeyPairName=aws-us-west-2-local --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.foundation:up:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file agentic-foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-foundation-prod --parameter-overrides Environment=prod KeyPairName=aws-us-west-2-local --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.foundation:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-foundation-staging --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.foundation:status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-foundation-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.service:package: npm run service:build && rm -f function.zip && cd ../service && zip -r ../aws/function.zip dist www node_modules package.json
scripts.service:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-service-a2a-mcp-example-staging --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.service:status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-service-a2a-mcp-example-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.website:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-website-example-staging --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.website:status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-website-example-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'

author: Mike Prince
